cause.description: Cross Wind Productions is an Christian based, youth, Independent Film production company, the only one of its kind. Located in Houston, Texas. This company auditions teenagers ages 14-18 then teaches them every aspect of making a film from acting to lighting and sound while incoporating Christ in the lesson. This Company has changed many peoples lives and can teach you more than any film making school can. Every movie is produced by teenagers and a few adults You may be familiar with some movies such as "Holly's Story" and "The Saber" 1. Teach teens about Chrstianity 2. Produce a movie with Chrstian based themes
cause.mission: Work with teenagers who are interested in film and teach them about film making at the same time incorporating Christianity
cause.name: Cross Wind Productions
